abstract: NCAA proposes new settlement in concussion lawsuit, with terms that include $70 million monitoring fund for athletes, $5 million for research and stricter return-to-play guidelines for athletes who sustain head injuries; other college sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The core terms of the new plan are similar to the original, but several tweaks were made to satisfy the federal judge who rejected the original proposal in December.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Proposes New Settlement in Lawsuit on Head Injuries
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Sports; Settlement Plan Adjusted

snippet: The core terms of the new plan are similar to the original, but several tweaks were made to satisfy the federal judge who rejected the original proposal in December.
